TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed CharacterCasing extends System.Enum

summary.span: Especifica maiúsculas e minúsculas de caracteres digitados manualmente em um controle .

span.span: Specifies the case of characters typed manually into a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks O valor dessa enumeração não afeta os caracteres que são adicionados a um programaticamente.The value of this enumeration does not affect characters that are added to a programmatically. ## Examples O exemplo a seguir mostra como usar o propriedade para converter todos os caracteres maiusculos que são inseridos manualmente em um .The following example shows how to use the property to convert all characters to uppercase that are manually entered into a . [!code-xaml[TextBoxMiscSnippets_snip#CharacterCasingExampleWholePage](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TextBoxMiscSnippets_snip/csharp/charactercasingexample.xaml#charactercasingexamplewholepage)] [!code-csharp[TextBoxMiscSnippets_procedural_snip#CharacterCasingCodeExampleWholePage](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TextBoxMiscSnippets_procedural_snip/CSharp/CharacterCasingExample.cs#charactercasingcodeexamplewholepage)] [!code-vb[TextBoxMiscSnippets_procedural_snip#CharacterCasingCodeExampleWholePage](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TextBoxMiscSnippets_procedural_snip/visualbasic/charactercasingexample.vb#charactercasingcodeexamplewholepage)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Controls.CharacterCasing Lower = int32(1)

summary.span: Os caracteres digitados em um são convertidos em minúsculas.

span.span: Characters typed into a are converted to lowercase.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Controls.CharacterCasing Normal = int32(0)

summary.span: Os caracteres digitados em um não são convertidos.

span.span: Characters typed into a are not converted.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Controls.CharacterCasing Upper = int32(2)

summary.span: Os caracteres digitados em um são convertidos em maiúsculas.

span.span: Characters typed into a are converted to uppercase.
